text:
Hello everyone! I’m Jonathan, I currently work at Ursa Computing working on Apache Arrow (both the R package and the broader ecosystem). I’ve been working in the R / data science world for years now. I created and maintain the dittodb package for testing database connections in R packages.

My colleague <@U01P0TA7YP5> recommended I join here after a conversation about an oddity a contributor to Arrow ran across (which prompted <https://r-devel.slack.com/archives/C01LVM9SJGJ/p1621969303009800>)

Nice to meet y’all
